product_name: Showers Pass Club Convertible 2 Bike Rain Pants - Men's
long_description: A commuter's best friend, the Showers Pass Club Convertible 2 pants seal out the weather. They're also breathable and can be converted to knickers when the ride home turns warm. Lightweight fabric features a waterproof, breathable laminate for durable protection; fully taped seams prevent water penetration. Zip off bottoms convert pants to knickers. Articulated knees encourage full freedom of movement. Large side pockets with water-resistant zippers securely stash a few items, such as ID and cash. Ankle zippers offer easy on/off over bike shoes. Dual leg straps keep pant legs away from chain and crank, boosting the shelf life of your Showers Pass Club Convertible 2 pants. Stay visible to others with an abundance of reflective taping.
